column2: Gloria Dei!\nWe have conquered Constantinople from the heretic Byzantines and now a Catholic Emperor will rule over the former eastern part of the Roman Empire.
column3: Gloria Dei ! Nous avons pris Constantinople aux hérétiques byzantins et maintenant c'est un Empereur catholique qui va diriger la partie orientale de l'Empire Romain.
column4: Gloria Dei!\nWe have conquered Constantinople from the heretic Byzantines and now a Catholic Emperor will rule over the former eastern part of the Roman Empire.
column6: Gloria Dei!\nWe have conquered Constantinople from the heretic Byzantines and now a Catholic Emperor will rule over the former eastern part of the Roman Empire.

column2: Constantinople has fallen to the might of the Catholic forces, and a Catholic Emperor now sits on the throne.
column3: Constantinople est tombée aux mains des forces catholiques et une Empereur catholique est maintenant assis sur le trône.

column2: This menu will allow you to change the name of various realms, such as the Byzantine Empire. Note that the last option is always the default.

This decision/event will allow you to choose what name the Byzantine Empire is known by in the game. You can always change it to something else, or set it back to the default “Byzantine Empire” if you change your mind. If you want to reset, select the last option, “Byzantine Empire (default)”.
If you wish to see the earlier options, temporarily choose one of the following, then activate the “Choose Realm Names” decision again.

This decision/event will allow you to choose what name  Rum is known by in the game. You can always change it to something else, or set it back to the default “Rum” if you change your mind. If you want to reset, select the last option, “Rum (default)”.

This decision/event will allow you to choose what name Romania (Latin Empire in vanilla) is known by in the game. You can always change it to something else, or set it back to the default “Romania” if you change your mind. If you want to reset, select the last option, “Latin Empire (vanilla default)”.Bear in mind the adjective for it still will be

This decision/event will allow you to choose what name the Roman Empire is known by in the game. You can always change it to something else, or set it back to the default “Roman Empire” if you change your mind. If you want to reset, select the last option, “Roman Empire (default)”.

column1: #From this mod (plus a copypasta from PB)

column2: This character has saved Byzantium, that is, Constantinople from foreign invaders.
This character rules in Constantinople, fighting greeks, turks and other foreign invaders, protecting the city from infidels and heretics.
Call the Varangian Guard to protect Constantinople once again.
Create a sucessor empire of the Byzantine Empire.
Create a sucessor empire of the Byzantine Empire.
The Rise and Fall of Rome
The Byzantine Empire, though it survives, is a mockery of its former glory. Since it has been reduced to such size and since we rule Constantinople, none question our claim to the Roman Empire.

To my former liege, [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. Not only you lost the throne of Constantinople, you lost the Varangian Guard too, I'll join the ruler of Constantinople.\nMy best regards, [From.GetBestName].

To my new liege, [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. Me and the Varangian Guard will be your personal guard from now on, while you're the ruler of Constantinople, as my former liege lost it to you.\nMy best regards, [From.GetBestName].
The Varangian Guard moves to your court.
A talented eunuch has been brought before my attention. He is currently one of the many eunuchs serving at your court, but perhaps I could make use of his skills.
I don't need another source of court intrigue.
Now that we have managed to retake all of Iconium our rightful rule of all of Anatolia is once more recognized.
Constantinople is now under true roman administration, saved from the menace of turks or filthy catholic pretenders of Rome
Constantinople is now under true roman administration, saved from the menace of turks or filthy catholic pretenders of Rome
We have conquered the lands of the Empire of Trebizond!
Change title to the Empire of Trebizond
Byzantium is no more, Constantinople has fallen, we must accept the inheritance of the Roman Empire to ourselves.
We have conquered all de jure territory of the Empire of Trebizond, the claimants of our throne!
Byzantium is no more, Constantinople has fallen, we must accept the inheritance of the Roman Empire to ourselves.
An army of loyalist of the Empire appears at Constantinople.\n
To [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. I'm joining Byzantium, so we can unite the Roman Empire.\nYour new vassal, [From.GetBestName].

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. I have saved Byzantium from the brink of destruction and I'm sending you this letter to invite you to become my vassal so the Empire can get stronger.\nSincerely, [From.GetBestName],Ruler of Constantinople.
To [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. I'm not joining this pretentious Roman-wannabe empire of yours.\nSincerely, [From.GetBestName].
